name: NexTier Oilfield Solutions Inc.
description: NexTier Oilfield Solutions Inc. is a leading provider of integrated completions and production services to the oil and natural gas industry in North America. Founded in 2018 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, the company emerged from the merger of C&J Energy Services and Keane Group, creating a comprehensive service provider with a focus on delivering value through innovative solutions. NexTier specializes in hydraulic fracturing, cementing, wireline services, and other critical completion activities. The company's advanced technology and data-driven approach enable operators to maximize efficiency and reduce costs while optimizing the production lifecycle of their assets. NexTier is committed to improving operational safety and sustainability, implementing environmentally friendly practices in its operations. As the demand for energy continues to grow, NexTier aims to support its clients in navigating the complexities of the oilfield landscape, leveraging its expertise to drive performance and profitability in a competitive market.
